title: All Ball - 'Last Dance' Rodman/Phil Takeaways; College Hoops Insiders Andy Katz and Jeff Goodman on G-League Jump, NCAA Name, Image, Likeness Unknowns
itunes:title: All Ball - 'Last Dance' Rodman/Phil Takeaways; College Hoops Insiders Andy Katz and Jeff Goodman on G-League Jump, NCAA Name, Image, Likeness Unknowns
description:
In this episode, Doug gives his take on episodes 3 and 4 The Last Dance featuring Dennis Rodman and Phil Jackson, and is joined by college basketball analysts Andy Katz and Jeff Goodman to discuss the recent trend of top high school recruits choosing the G-League over college hoops, and what the new NCAA name, image, likeness rules mean in terms of dollars for student-athletes. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
